entry.title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 8: Creation: Genesis as Foundationâ€”Part 1

media:group.media:title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 8: Creation: Genesis as Foundationâ€”Part 1
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 2, lesson 8 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "How To Interpret Scripture" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled "Creation: Genesis as Foundationâ€”Part 1". Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
This week's lesson is for May 16 to May 22, 2020.
Reading: John 1:1â€“3, Gen. 1:3â€“5, Exod. 20:8â€“11, Rev. 14:7, Matt. 19:3â€“6, Rom. 5:12
Memory Text: â€œIn the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God. He was in the beginning with God. All things were made through Him, and without Him nothing was made that was made. In Him was life, and the life was the light of menâ€ (John 1:1â€“4, NKJV).
Sunday (John Lomacang) - â€œIn the Beginningâ€¦.â€ Monday (Kenny Shelton) - â€œThe Days of Creationâ€ Tuesday (Ryan Day) - â€œThe Sabbath and Creationâ€ Wednesday (Jill Morikone) - â€œCreation and Marriageâ€ Thursday (John Dinzey) - â€œCreation, the Fall, and the Crossâ€

entry.title: Coronavirus Aftermath | God's People at Risk (Live Church)

media:group.media:title: Coronavirus Aftermath | God's People at Risk (Live Church)
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with John Lomacang. What is the Coronavirus laying the foundation for? Are Christian's at risk of loosing their religious freedom? The books of Matthew and Revelation reveal the prophetic outlook for God's people. We are living in the end times of earth's history and soon the beast of Revelation 13 will speak like a dragon. Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Pastor John Lomacang.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 7: Language, Text, and Context | 2020

media:group.media:title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 7: Language, Text, and Context | 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 2, lesson 7 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "How To Interpret Scripture" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled "Language, Text, and Context". Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
This week's lesson is for May 9 to May 15, 2020.
Reading: Deut. 32:46, 47; 1 Kings 3:6; Num. 6:24â€“26; Gen. 1:26, 27; Gen. 2:15â€“23; Gen. 15:1â€“5.
Memory Text: â€œ â€˜Take this Book of the Law, and put it beside the ark of the covenant of the Lord your God, that it may be there as a witness against youâ€™ â€ (Deuteronomy 31:26, NKJV).
Sunday (Ryan Day) - â€œUnderstanding the Scripturesâ€ Monday (John Lomacang) - â€œWords and Their Meaningsâ€ Tuesday (John Dinzey) - â€œRepetition, Word Patterns, and Meaningâ€ Wednesday (Kenny Shelton) - â€œTexts and Contextsâ€ Thursday (Jill Morikone) - â€œBooks and Their Messageâ€

entry.title: Preparation | The Wise will Understand (Live Church)

media:group.media:title: Preparation | The Wise will Understand (Live Church)
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with John Dinzey. The second coming of Jesus is near. Even though no man knows the day or the hour, the prophetic signs are all around. The bridegroom spoken about in the Bible will come back for His Church. Don't be sleeping when He comes! Make preparation like the wise virgins did in the book of Matthew chapter 25. Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Pastor John Dinzey.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 6: Why Is Interpretation Needed? | 2020

media:group.media:title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 6: Why Is Interpretation Needed? | 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 2, lesson 6 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "How To Interpret Scripture" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled "Why Is Interpretation Needed?". Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
This week's lesson is for May 2 to May 8, 2020.
Reading: Luke 24:36-45. 1 Cor. 12:10. 1 Cor. 14:26; Acts 17:16-32; John 12:42-43
Memory Text: â€œBut without faith it is impossible to please Him, for he who comes to God must believe that He is, and that He is a rewarder of those who diligently seek Himâ€ (Hebrews 11:6, NKJV).
Sunday (Jill Morikone) - â€œPresuppositionsâ€ Monday (John Lomacang) - â€œTranslation and Interpretationâ€ Tuesday (Ryan Day) - â€œThe Bible and Cultureâ€ Wednesday (Danny Shelton) - â€œOur Sinful and Fallen Natureâ€ Thursday (Kenny Shelton) - â€œWhy Interpretation Is Importantâ€

entry.title: Lockdown | Keys to Break Free (Live Church)

media:group.media:title: Lockdown | Keys to Break Free (Live Church)
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with Jill Morikone. As many people deal with a literal lockdown, in this sermon we'll study a spiritual lockdown brought about by sin. Our world is filled with iniquity and sadness, but God has not forgotten about us. He's given us a key to get out! Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Jill Morikone.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 5: By Scripture Aloneâ€”Sola Scriptura | 2020

media:group.media:title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 5: By Scripture Aloneâ€”Sola Scriptura | 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 2, lesson 5 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "How To Interpret Scripture" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled "By Scripture Aloneâ€”Sola Scriptura". Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
This week's lesson is for April 25 to May 1, 2020.
Reading: 1 Cor. 4:1-6; Titus 1:9. 2 Tim. 1:13; Mark 12:10, 26; Luke 24:27, 44-45; Isa. 8:20
Memory Text: â€œFor the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heartâ€ (Hebrews 4:12, NKJV).
Sunday (Kenny Shelton) - â€œScripture as the Ruling Normâ€ Monday (Jill Morikone) - â€œThe Unity of Scriptureâ€ Tuesday (John Lomacang) - â€œThe Clarity of Scriptureâ€ Wednesday (John Dinzey) - â€œScripture Interprets Scriptureâ€ Thursday (Ryan Day) - â€œSola Scriptura and Ellen G. Whiteâ€
